title: Adguard Premium 2.10.163 RC2 (Android) - ArmaanPC
description:
Adguard Premium 2.10.163 RC2 (Android) - ArmaanPC


Adguard - Internet filter for mobile devices that protects you from advertising, malicious and phishing sites, online tracking in a web browser when working on a smartphone or tablet on the Internet.

Adguard is designed to block absolutely all types of online advertising, speed up the loading of web pages, save mobile traffic and protect your device from possible online threats.

Adguard filters only web browsers, without affecting the operation of other applications installed on your device. The application uses a unique technology to filter the traffic of your smartphone / tablet, which does not require ROOT-rights.
The speed of the filtering will not depend on the operation of the VPN server, since it is placed directly on your device with the Android platform.

Main features:
• Antibanner completely removes all advertising elements from web pages, including video ads.
• Anti-phishing protects the device from possible threats by checking all downloaded web pages and apk-files.
• Two filter modes: local VPN mode or local HTTP proxy mode. The first does not require ROOT rights, and the VPN server is on your device, so you do not have to pass your traffic through a remote server to filter. The second is recommended only if you use a handheld device or if you want to use Adguard along with any VPN.
• Anti-tracking. Protection from tracking your actions on the Internet.
• Block ads in applications.
• Filter social network widgets. Social widgets (Like buttons, Like, Class and others) will be deleted if the appropriate filter is activated.
• User-friendly interface. Simple interface and convenient application management.
• Advertising filters for sites in different languages. Adguard for Android is able to block advertising in different languages: Russian, English, German, Dutch, Japanese, Spanish and Portuguese.

Premium features:
1. Web protection against online threats: blocking malicious and phishing sites.
2. Improved ad blocking. Maximum quality of filtration.
3. Premium technical support.

Released: 2017
OS: Android 4.0.3 +
Root: Not required
Language: Multi | Russian
Medicine: cured
File size: 16.6 MB
